Version : 0.0.1

Hello,
Here is the README to how to use the _package "Mathex"
So first we have 3 class:
- Operator
- ProblemRandom = No Function Definied
- DrawPos.Library = Only Shape.Circle(Size, TextColor, TimeToWait, Speed,BackgroundColor)

How use DrawPos.Library.Shape.Circle(Size, TextColor, TimeToWait, Speed,BackgroundColor):
exemple : DrawPos.Library.Shape.Circle(90, "#f56", 0, 0,"#000")


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


Version : 0.0.2

Hello, 
The next update is now published
we have add more thing in the library, and we give you how to use it:

____Shape:
- Square(Color, speed, BackgroundColor, WindowName)
- Rectangle(Color, speed, BackgroundColor, WindowName)
- Pentagone(Color, speed, BackgroundColor, WindowName)
- Rombhus(Color, speed, BackgroundColor, WindowName)
- Hexagone(Color, speed, BackgroundColor, WindowName)
- Octogone(Color, speed, BackgroundColor,WindowName)
- Triangle(SizeOfLine, Color, speed, BackgroundColor, WindowName)


___Person:
No Function


___Object:
- Computer()
- Phone()
- Table()
- Paint()


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Version : 0.0.3

Hello Mathexer, today i publish the new version of Mathexs (0.0.3)

and the changes is bigger:


- Square Racin added 
- And The drawing is completed

2 small update can update all of the Python _package
